article_title: UnitedHealth Withdrawing From Most ACA Markets
article_text:
UnitedHealth Withdrawing From Most ACA Markets

Law360, New York (April 19, 2016, 10:59 AM ET) -- UnitedHealth Group will be pulling out of all but a “handful” of state Affordable Care Act marketplaces, the company’s CEO said in an earnings call Tuesday morning, a move experts say shouldn’t have a significant impact on the market.



CEO Stephen J. Hemsley’s announcement came the day after the Kaiser Family Foundation released a report concluding that the withdrawal would not be detrimental to the marketplace — although its effects would vary greatly by state — and less than six months after UnitedHealth first announced that...
